> Hmm, no. You build clients based on the definition of the kind of  
> ser=
vice. With SOAP that would be WSDL and with e.g. AtomPub it is the  
> RFC =
5023. Building clients for individual services makes no sense.

Well, then =
you build clients based on media type descriptions? That would be just as m=
eaningfull as building something on top of RFC 5023. AtomPub/MediaType - wh=
at's the difference?

/J=F8rn
